CustomField.formula: IF (TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'New', 'Pending', IF( OR( TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'Unused', TEXT(RTL_Contact_Status__c) = 'Close', RTL_Count_Offer_Product__c = 0), 'N/A', IF( RTL_Count_Interest__c+RTL_Count_Not_Interest__c+RTL_Count_NA__c < RTL_Count_Offer_Product__c , 'Pending', IF( RTL_Count_Interest__c>0 , 'Interested', IF( RTL_Count_Not_Interest__c>0, 'Not Interested', 'N/A' ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Offer Result Eng
